segments.text: This whole situation is genuinely making me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just spewing water everywhere, a steady stream onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don't understand how the woman can't feel the cold water around her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's already a substantial puddle, growing larger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's that boy on the stool; it's practically vertical on two legs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall, I just know it, and it will be a painful thud.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so close, she might get pulled down with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at them all to stop, to look, to pay attention!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of negligence can lead to serious injuries, not just a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine if she slips, or if the children crack their heads on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside offers no comfort against this impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s simply irresponsible, this lack of awareness from the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself clenching my jaw just watching it unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Something bad is going to happen here, it’s inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR
